title: XP
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the More Or Less game card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with 250 XP on the bottom left corner of the card

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user played the More Or Less
AND More Or Less is final

title: Token
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the More Or Less game card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with 5 tokens in the bottom left corner of the card

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN More Or Less game is final
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user receives 5 tokens for each correct pick

title: Leaderboard header
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user views the BTN leaderboard
custom_expected: THEN user is displayed with 'Pick correctly within the allotted time. Your first ten correct answers each earn:' copy
